title: Jennifer Lopez is nearly nude as she poses in tiny bodysuit to promote her new single Baila Conmigo
text:
Jennifer Lopez took to Instagram on Thursday night, sharing a sultry new photo to promote her new single Baila Conmigo, which she unveiled in full.

The 50 year old Bronx native shared a nearly-nude snap to promote the Spanish-language single, which translates to Dance With Me, with the song debuting on her YouTube page late Thursday night.

'Dale que dale mas duro que la música rompe los muros que solo bailando me curo Baila Conmigo,' Lopez said on Instagram, which translates to, 'Give it harder than music breaks the walls that only dancing I heal Dance with Me.'

New song: Jennifer Lopez took to Instagram on Thursday night, sharing a sultry new photo to promote her new single Baila Conmigo, which she unveiled in full

Lopez also took to her Instagram story to share close-up viewpoints of the single artwork, with the singer wearing a skimpy string swimsuit.

She was seen with her legs drawn up close to her body as she sat mostly naked on the floor.

The new song comes as the multi-faceted entertainer has been keeping very busy, putting in a surprise appearance at Maluma's New York City concert over the weekend while also filming new new movie Marry Me.

Close up: Lopez also took to her Instagram story to share close-up viewpoints of the single artwork, with the singer wearing a skimpy string swimsuit

Surprise: The new song comes as the multi-faceted entertainer has been keeping very busy, putting in a surprise appearance at Maluma's New York City concert over the weekend while also filming new new movie Marry Me

Lopez also put in a surprise appearance at Milan Fashion Week last week, walking the runway in a new version of her iconic Versace jungle print dress that she first wore at the 2000 Grammys.

'There was so much electricity in the room and there was so much love for her,' Lopez said about Donatella Versace.

'To create something that has that much impact is a pretty special thing and I was happy to be a part of that with her,' she added.

Surprise appearance: Lopez also put in a surprise appearance at Milan Fashion Week last week, walking the runway in a new version of her iconic Versace jungle print dress that she first wore at the 2000 Grammys

Lopez's new song comes just weeks after she was announced as one of the co-headliners at the Super Bowl 53 halftime show, alongside Shakira.

It isn't clear what songs each of the iconic Latinx singers will perform, or if she will include Balia Conmigo in her Super Bowl set when she performs at Hard Rock Stadium in Miami.

The singer/actress, along with her fiance Alex Rodriguez, recently hosted her Super Bowl halftime show producer Jay-Z at their Miami home.

New song: Lopez's new song comes just weeks after she was announced as one of the co-headliners at the Super Bowl 53 halftime show, alongside Shakira

Lopez is coming off the surprise box office hit Hustlers, which has earned $112.3 million worldwide from just a $20 million budget.

She is currently filming Marry Me alongside Owen Wilson and Sarah Silverman, which is slated for release sometime in 2020.

The singer/actress is also slated to play Rose Alvarez in NBC's Bye Bye Birdie Live, though production has been pushed numerous times.
description: Jennifer Lopez took to Instagram on Thursday night, sharing a sultry new photo to promote her new single Balia Conmigo, which debuts on Friday.
